MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA30 postcode area of Largs. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and are working to get supplies restored. The engineers are on site and are still carrying out investigations to locate the fault and we now expect your supply to be restored by 6.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:05am Sunday, 18 April 2021
